content: DD 150-U Core drill Versatile diamond coring machine for handheld or rig-based coring from 8-162 mm (5/16 - 6-3/8) in diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features High motor performance and sturdy three-speed gearing for optimum drilling speed 360-degree adjustable side handle with integrated dust and water management functions Real-time feedback display with digital spirit level, gear selector, power control function, advanced usage statistics and easy-to-understand service messages Bluetooth® connectivity to WMS 100 water management system Real-time usage statistics analysis via the Hilti Connect app Applications Rig-based wet drilling in concrete for pipe penetrations, cable trays and ducts and for the installation of railings and barriers Hand-guided wet drilling for setting large-diameter anchors and reinforcing bars Hand-guided dry drilling in masonry for pipe penetrations in plumbing, heating and air conditioning installations and for chimney and stove installation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 5/16 - 6-3/8 in Base material: Concrete, Reinforced concrete, Asphalt, Masonry Operation mode: Hand-held and rig-mounted drilling system Technical Data | Diameter range | 5/16 - 6-3/8 in | Base material | Concrete, Reinforced concrete, Asphalt, Masonry | Operation mode | Hand-held or rig-mounted drilling system | Number of gears | 3 | No load RPM | gear 1: 840 rpm; gear 2: 1640 rpm; gear 3: 3070 rpm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 18.4 lb | Weight of complete system | 48 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 20.3 x 5.1 x 6.3 in | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 101 dB (A) | 1 | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) with diamond core A (ah,DD) | 3.9 m/s² | Corner accessibility | 2.1 in | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3679406 - DD 150-U BI+STAND+SPX-L+WMS 100 BLE - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U 120V BLE Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 150-U Tool case assy - 1x Connection end BI - 1x X-Change barrel 3 X 17 - 3x X-Change module 3 SPX-L - 1x DD-WCS-122 Water collector sys assy - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 150-U CTL - 1x DD-WMS 100 BLE 120V Water management sys - 1x DD-WMS 100 Push bar - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 1x Tool bag medium - 5x Filtration bag - 3679405 - DD 150-U BI+STAND+WMS 100 BLE - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U 120V BLE Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 150-U Tool case assy - 1x DD-WCS-122 Water collector sys assy - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 150-U CTL - 1x DD-WMS 100 BLE 120V Water management sys - 1x DD-WMS 100 Push bar - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 5x Filtration bag - 3679404 - DD 150-U BI+STAND+SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U 120V BLE Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 150-U Tool case assy - 1x Connection end BI - 1x X-Change barrel 3 X 17 - 3x X-Change module 3 SPX-L - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 150-U CTL - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P -
